scripts.opennext:preview:branch: BR=${GITHUB_REF_NAME:-${CF_BRANCH:-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null)}}; ALIAS=$(printf "%s" "${BR:-preview}" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | sed -E 's/[^a-z0-9-]+/-/g;s/^-+//;s/-+$//' | cut -c1-40); echo "Preview alias: $ALIAS"; pnpm opennext:build && npx opennextjs-cloudflare upload --preview-alias "$ALIAS"
scripts.cf-typegen: pnpm exec wrangler types --env-interface CloudflareEnv cloudflare-env.d.ts
